entry.title: Scalability issues
entry.summary: The class of machine previously used for Bitcoin processing has become obsolete due to an overload when accessing the blk0002.dat file along with another datfile. This has resulted in a loss of around 20 blocks per day. The user has not seen any other mentions of cryptocurrency in the thread and is unsure of how new hardware would perform in this situation. As a result, they plan to go shopping for new equipment.
